docs.title: Compound CAD Help Center
docs.text:
Welcome to the Compound CAD Help Center, your go-to resource for all things related to FreeCAD, ERPNext, and our specialized services.

We’ve designed this space to provide clear and concise solutions for your needs. Explore our documentation, tutorials, and FAQs to maximize your experience with our tools and services.

docs.title: 1. Getting Started
docs.text:
Learn the basics of working with Compound CAD, accessing our services, and navigating our platform.

  • Overview
  • Setting Up Your Account
  • First Steps

Step-by-step guides and examples to help you design efficiently with FreeCAD.

docs.title: 3. ERPNext
docs.text: Deep dive into ERPNext setups, workflows, and best practices tailored to your needs.

docs.title: 4. FAQs
docs.text: Find answers to the most common questions about our tools, services, and processes.

docs.title: 5. Contact Support
docs.text: Need help? Reach out to our support team for personalized assistance.

docs.title: 🔎 Search for Articles
docs.text: Use the search bar at the top to quickly find what you need. Whether you're looking for tutorials, troubleshooting guides, or product documentation, we’ve got you covered.

docs.title: 🌟 About Compound CAD
docs.text:
Compound CAD specializes in delivering custom solutions for design and manufacturing teams. Whether you're working with FreeCAD, integrating ERPNext, we’re here to help you succeed.

Let’s get started and make the most of your tools!

docs.title: Contact Support
docs.text: Email us for Support

docs.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) for Compound CAD
Table of Contents
docs.text:
• General Information
  • CAD Design Services
  • FreeCAD Consulting and Development
  • ERPNext Consulting and Development
  • Consultations and Quotes
  • Pricing

docs.title: What is Compound CAD?
docs.text: Compound CAD is a consulting service offering expert solutions in CAD design and ERPNext system optimization. We provide remote CAD design services, FreeCAD and ERPNext consulting, and custom development tailored to your business needs.

docs.title: Where are you located?
docs.text: We are based in Ontario, Canada, but provide remote services to clients worldwide.

docs.title: What CAD design services do you offer?
docs.text: We offer high-quality, custom CAD design services, including 3D modeling, drafting, and prototyping. Our remote CAD design services are fast, accurate, and cost-effective, starting at $35/hour.

docs.title: How does remote CAD design work?
docs.text: We work with you remotely, using collaborative tools to share project files, discuss ideas, and provide real-time updates. You’ll have full visibility of the design process throughout the project.

docs.title: What is FreeCAD consulting and development?
docs.text: We specialize in FreeCAD consulting to help streamline your design processes. This includes custom plugin development, script and macro creation, and process optimization to ensure your FreeCAD setup runs efficiently. This service is available at $65/hour.

docs.title: Can you help me with FreeCAD automation?
docs.text: Yes, we can help you automate repetitive tasks and optimize workflows by creating custom scripts, macros, and plugins tailored to your specific FreeCAD setup.

docs.title: What is ERPNext consulting and development?
docs.text: We provide expert ERPNext consulting to customize and optimize your ERP system. Our services include workflow customization, system integration, and custom development for modules, reports, and automation. We help streamline operations in areas like inventory management, accounting, and project tracking.

docs.title: How can ERPNext improve my business?
docs.text: ERPNext helps automate business processes, track data across departments, and integrate different systems. We can tailor ERPNext to suit your specific needs, improving efficiency and data accuracy across your operations.

docs.title: How do I book a complimentary consultation?
docs.text: You can book a complimentary consultation by contacting us directly or filling out the contact form on our website. We'll discuss your project’s needs and how we can assist you with CAD design, FreeCAD, or ERPNext solutions.

docs.title: How do I request a quote for my project?
docs.text: To request a quote, visit our "Get a Quote" page and provide details about your project. We’ll send you a customized proposal based on your needs.

docs.title: What is your pricing structure for CAD design services?
docs.text: Our CAD design services are priced at $35/hour. Prices vary based on the scope and complexity of the project, and we offer flexible pricing options to suit your needs.

docs.title: What is your pricing for FreeCAD and ERPNext consulting?
docs.text: Our consulting services for FreeCAD and ERPNext are priced at $65/hour. This includes custom development, workflow optimization, and expert support.
